body:
Consider a scenario where I have to load multiple modules for a specific package : 

```
    python:
        modules:
             python@xxxx: FirstModule SecondModule
```

On Cray `daint` system that I am currently testing, in order to make `python` module `visible`, I have to first load other `prerequisite` module. How to specify this? It seems I can't specify list there.

May be I can update `compilers.yaml` with inserting`prerequisite ` module but it would be cleaner to specify that in `config.yaml`.
title: How to specify  multiple modules in modules block of packages.yaml ?
